name: cut-erator
description: A web based tool that allows the user to easily upload and print images in layouts compatible with the Duplo DocuCutter CC-229. The program currently includes support for 3.5"x2", 3.5"x5", 4"x6", 5"x7", and 8"x10" flat cards. In addition to this, it can generate 10"x7", and 3.5"x5" folded designs.
